CustomField.formula: IF(OR(CONTAINS('K/K - DR,K/K - DV,K/K - DV - Mobile,K/K - En charge de magasin,K/K - En charge de magasin - Mobile,K/K - Foire,K/K - Formateur,K/K - RV,K/K - RV - Mobile,K/K - RVJ,K/K - RVJ - Mobile,K/K - TP,K/K - Vendeur,K/K - Vendeur - Mobile', CreatedBy.Profile.Name), CreatedBy.UserRole.Name = 'Foire', CreatedBy.UserRole.Name = 'Formateur'), CreatedBy.libelleMagasin__c, '')
